title: Basics Dungeon
description: Master the fundamentals of programming. Learn variables, data types, and basic operations.

title: Control Flow Dungeon
description: Navigate through conditions and loops. Master if-else statements and iteration.

title: Functions Dungeon
description: Unlock the power of reusable code. Learn how functions work, parameters, returns, and scope.

title: Data Structures Dungeon
description: Explore essential structures like arrays, lists, dictionaries, and sets.

title: OOP Dungeon
description: Enter the realm of classes and objects. Learn about OOP principles and design.

title: Recursion Dungeon
description: Face infinite depths. Learn recursive thinking, base cases, and classic recursion problems.

title: Algorithms Dungeon
description: Dive into sorting, searching, greedy methods, and divide-and-conquer strategies.

title: Advanced Data Structures Dungeon
description: Master trees, graphs, heaps, and hashes to handle complex problems efficiently.

title: Dynamic Programming Dungeon
description: Learn memoization, tabulation, and break down impossible problems into smaller ones.

title: Final Boss Dungeon
description: Everything you have learned comes together. Solve multi-step, real-world challenge problems.
